cmp: 占 (to observe/to divine, to divine, to occupy/to constitute/to make up/to account)
mng: point, dot, drop, speck, o'clock, point (in space or time), to draw a dot, to check on a list, to choose, to order (food in a restaurant), to touch briefly, to hint, to light, to ignite, to pour a liquid drop by drop, (old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1], dot stroke in Chinese characters, classifier for items

exm.mng: to hit, to press, to strike (on the keyboard), to click (a web page button)
hot spot, point of special interest
important point, main point, focus, key (project etc), to focus on, to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election), to re-evaluate
a bit, a little, one dot, one point
number of clicks, number of hits (on a website)
to illuminate, to turn on the lights, to light (a blaze)
